The two stars burn holes in the screen with their intensity.  Lots of gratuitous, rub-your-face-in-it violence.  Lots of head shots and CGI blood splattering on walls and such, but the action scenes are unbelievable and only mediocre.  It's a really simple story and yet somehow they manage to make it seem convoluted.  The movie lacks good pacing and cohesion.  The original was a much better film.  IMHO
